revisionDesc.change: Finalized - Ready.
Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - See previous comments.

Vote - AcceptText - also agreed on Î¼Î·, and I think this is fine as a PN correction, since it affirms a reading that the ed. pr. did not print. One option to indicate that the ed. pr. considered this reading, however, would be to include the alts as the deprecated reading: <:<#Î¼Î·=48#>=PN A. Stornaiuolo (image)|ed|<:<#Î¼Î·=48#>|alt|<#Î¼=40#>:>:>.

Vote - DEFER - Agreed on Î¼Î· but this has already been mentioned as an |alt| in ed. pr., https://archive.org/details/oxyrhynchuspapyr0062unse/page/136/mode/1up/. I suggest recording it with double |alt|, not as a PN correction.
